env HOME=$WORK/home
env $=$

unparam .
# TODO: oneUnusedPhi and ! unparam .
cmpenv stderr stderr.golden

-- go.mod --
module testdata.tld/foo
-- stderr.golden --
-- foo.go --
package foo

type FooType int

var DoWork func()

func allUsedPhi(a, b FooType) *FooType {
	DoWork()
	c := a + b
	return &c
}

func oneUnusedPhi(a, b FooType) *FooType {
	DoWork()
	c := a + 4
	return &c
}

func PhiUse(fn2 bool) {
	var a, b FooType = 2, 3
	fn := allUsedPhi
	if fn2 {
		fn = oneUnusedPhi
	}
	println(fn(a, b))
}
